groups:concept.deftn: the intended consumer of the information in the news, event or opportunity

outline.groups:deftn: anyone who designs, produces, implements, maintains or tests learning resources, software, collections, tools or data sources
anyone who provides learning opportunities in a structured environment at any educational level, both formal and informal
anyone in the general population who has an interest in or might participate in the news, event or opportunity
anyone who catalogs, manages, or acts as a resource about a particular collection of objects
anyone who supervises individuals, large projects or budgets within an organization
anyone who investigates topics, problems, issues or events in order to advance knowledge of a field
anyone who investigates topics, problems, issues or events in order to advance their own knowledge, skills or understanding; often in a structured learning environment or through self-study
